What to deduct: Reduction in GST incurred for which a credit note has been received or a debit note has been issued
Example/details: Reduction in GST amount for:Purchase returnsDiscount given by your supplier
context: completing-gst-returns             Box 7: Input tax and refunds claimed

What to deduct: Repayment of input tax claimed to Comptroller of GST
Example/details: If you have not paid your supplier within 12 months from the due date of payment and have claimed input tax, you are required to repay the input tax claimed to the Comptroller of GST.Please refer to If I have claimed GST before paying my supplier for more details.
context: completing-gst-returns             Box 7: Input tax and refunds claimed
